Class: TurtleContextManagement

TurtleContextManagement()

Manages context retrieval and usage in the Turtle framework.

Constructor

new TurtleContextManagement()

Classes

TurtleContextManagement

Methods

get(name, isChildAccess) → {TurtleContext|null}

Retrieves a context by its name, optionally allowing child access.

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
name string

The name of the context to retrieve.
isChildAccess boolean false

Whether to allow access to child contexts.
Returns:

The requested context or null if not found.

Type
TurtleContext | null

use(name, context, isLocal)

Uses a context with a given name and associates it with the target.

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
name string

The name of the context to use.
context TurtleContext

The context to use.
isLocal boolean false

Indicates whether the context is local.
